mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS id, r.product_id AS productId, p.name AS productName, r.rating AS rating, r.content AS content, r.created_at AS createdAt FROM reviews r JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (product_id, user_id, rating, content) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId}, #{rating}, #{content})
